content: the **hygge arrow gloves** are textured elegant and extra cozy this pattern comes in 3 sizes and offers the option for making both **fingerless gloves** and **mittens** this pdf pattern includes written instructions photos and links to video tutorials please note that this is an ad-free pdf version of a pattern that you can find on my blog for free here 1 you can find the pattern for the matching headband ** here 2 ** **materials** 4 0-mm g/6 us 8 uk crochet hook dk 3 light weight yarn tapestry needle **yarn suggestions** i used knit picks simply alpaca aran weight although this yarn is listed as aran 4 medium it definitely feels like a dk 3 light weight yarn feel free to use any yarn that meets gauge **size & yardage** this pattern is written for sizes small medium large **small** hand circ 7 -7 5 18-19 cm 109 yds/159 yds **medium** hand circ 7 5 -8 19-20 5 cm 114 yds/164 yds **large** hand circ 8 -8 5 20 5-21 5 cm 125 yds/175 yds *this pattern is written in us terms* **gauge** 9 sts for 3 repeats worked with the wrapped arrow stitch in 2 5 cm **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni 1 https //raffamusadesigns com/crochet-hygge-arrow-gloves/ 2 https //raffamusadesigns com/crochet-hygge-arrows-headband/ 3 https //raffamusa--itchinforsomestitchin thrivecart com/winter-wonders-2021/
